forbidden: You don't have permission to access the requested resource
accessDenied: Access denied due to invalid credentials
internalServerError: Oops ! Something went wrong. Our server encountered an internal error and was unable to handle your request. We're working on it. Please try again later.
notFound: The requested resource is not found
invalidId: The provided ID is not valid
invalidId_plural: The provided IDs are not valid
categoryNotFound: There is no existing category corresponding to the provided identifier
category.nameAlreadyExists: A category with the same name already exists
recipeSourceNotFound: There is no existing recipe source corresponding to the provided identifier

recipeSource.websiteAlreadyExists: A recipe source with the same website already exists
account.cannotReportAbuseOnYourData: You cannot report abuse on your own data

phoneNumberAlreadyExists: The provided phoneNumber is already in use by an existing user
userNotFound: There is no existing user corresponding to the provided identifier

recipeAlreadyFavorite: This recipe already exists in your favorite list
